article_title: U.N. Members Agree on Syria Disarmament
article_text:
UNITED NATIONS—The five most powerful members of the United Nations Security Council agreed to a resolution that requires the Syrian government to surrender its chemical weapons, but in a concession to Russia makes no threat of enforcement.

The draft resolution, which was presented to the full Security Council on Thursday night, would implement a U.S.-Russian deal on the destruction of the Syrian arsenal by the middle of next...
